website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech UE Air Speaker is a worthwhile third-party AirPlay speaker for homes demanding premium sound from iOS devices, but bargain hunters can save $100 and go portable with the Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Speaker.
pros: Logitech's elegant UE Air Speaker can capably fill a large room with dynamic sound, and its accompanying UE Air iOS app reduces pairing to a few easy steps
cons: The rotating hinge under the hardware dock feels flimsy and prone to malfunction

customer_reviews.title: Carton defaced during shipping; Carton NOT suitable for shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped in an original retail carton with no additional packing. Considering the value of this item, I expected it to be shipped in another/better carton. I intend to give this item as a gift to my nephew and his wife at their baby shower. Unfortunately, the carton was defaced considerably during shipment. So, I now have to remove the speaker and give it to them outside the carton, and outside of their baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: George J. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived, and the AirPlay works perfectly. The sound is awsome! Clear treble, the basis smooth and ample, especially for demanding classical music. I had a Geneva bookshelf speaker (at three times the price) and this is far better and a richer sound. The Geneva would distort slightly for no reason: this is just great. And even better with the iPad app which can adjust the sound.
customer_reviews.author: blny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: Got this for listening on the patio ... far from my tube amp set-up. Wow, I am impressed with the sound quality, clarity, and bass! Too bad Logitech has discontinued this model. Got one for my daughter last year too.
customer_reviews.author: William K.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: We wanted music throughout our home and this Airplay enabled speaker worked out nicely. We tried Sonos, but couldn't use our existing computer speakers (Bose) with that system. Apple's AirPort Express allowed us to connect our stereo system to iTunes. This Logitech speaker has a built-in AirPlay connection which made it easy to connect to our iTunes library wirelessly. Nice sound, easy to set-up, and it looks pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great air speaker. It has a rich sound, deep bass and is very crisp and clear when volume is turned up. It fits in nicely with our decor and is easy to unplug and move, if you want to take it to the yard or another room. It's as good or better than the more expensive speakers. I would recommend this air speaker to anyone looking for a quality speaker for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great speaker, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speaker with great quality sound. I bought this to go in our exercise room so I can listen to music while working out. It was easy to setup, and within minutes i had airplay available. The sound is great, plays great from my iphone and ipad. Highly recommended if looking for portable speaker that can go anywhere (of course needs outlet)
customer_reviews.author: moman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.  Simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our living room and use it to play itunes and pandora from an iphone. The sound is great and AirPlay makes it very easy to use. I wish it had a Lightning connector for iPhone 5, but we are able to use the adapter to make the dock work for the iPhone 5.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome airplay speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with any iOS device. Never had any issues with it. I would recommend putting it on a shelf with the back a few inches away from the wall. The sound will bounce off the wall and sound a bit deeper and fuller. It was very east to setup, connect, and use.
customer_reviews.author: mjolda

customer_reviews.title: great pick!
customer_reviews.text: good choice...good quality...fair price... exactly the void i had in my den/office. iPod/itouch play at a suitable volume without needing constant attention while i conduct other business on the computer. sound quality matches my old 80's infinity tower speakers which were 5ft tall and weighed 35 lbs each! almost a bose sound without a bose price!
customer_reviews.author: donovan maccabee

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound.  Like the portability.
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 of these things scattered around the house. There is music anywhere you go ☺
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ericson

customer_reviews.title: Quality system!
customer_reviews.text: NICE! LOVE this sytem! Connects to Itunes wirelessly and docks my iTouch perfectly! The sound is POWERFUL from this set...bass.
customer_reviews.author: Dbisn6x0

customer_reviews.title: Great start! Bad ending....
customer_reviews.text: Started out great. After a week using it the unit started losing the wifi connection fading on and off. Finally the unit stopped working all together. Would not even power up. Sent it back for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Good deal...
customer_reviews.text: Works great with good sound quality. Easy to set up. One con is the inability to control volume through the app or remote, though this is a minor nuisance since you can crank the volume on the speaker and turn down the phone volume which works well. Another is its cost but I found a good deal on an 'open box" product.
customer_reviews.author: Sigailix

customer_reviews.title: For The Money You Pay It Should Work Better
customer_reviews.text: For the money you pay for this it should work much better than it does. While sound quality is good to average the hassle in trying to get this thing to seamlessly connect over WiFi is a huge pain. More often than not I have to re-sync it with my WLAN which consist of all Apple hardware that's designed for Air Play. I WOULD NOT BUY THIS AGAIN IF GIVEN THE CHANCE.
customer_reviews.author: Williwaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice system
customer_reviews.text: This piece has become my main speaker system for my kitchen world. I can AirPlay video while I am working at the stove and stay entertained. Sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dinovi

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for a year and a half. It sounds great and setup is easy. I constantly stream from my iPhone and it gets a nice big sound. But for parties it shines as I stream from my MacBook Pro through the Logitech and an Apple TV playing through my Onkyo- three sources coursing through the house. I've definitely gotten my money's worth out of this Logitech. I'd buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Quadriplegic music lover
customer_reviews.text: I have limited hand mobility so using a traditional stereo is no longer possible.. Now I can access my complete PC iTunes library using my iPhone as the remote. (The files reside on my hard drive, not my phone.) I was using my with my Apple TV to play music through big TV, which turned out to be expensive. Bass can be a bit muddy, but I just turned the treble up. Despite other reviews, you can use your phone to adjust the volume. One just uses the volume control on your phones music app. Jazz, americana, rock and instrumentals...mmmmm....very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the sound coming from these speakers. I have one in my bedroom and one in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an easy way to pipe music throughout the house and how wonderful has this been. Fantastic sound, deep base, crisp. Setup is easy enough with the App download or directly docking it to the speaker. No speaker wires - Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lovett

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good up to 75% volume. Looks great. Totally AirPlay friendly.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice wi-fi/AirPlay speaker. Don't get this if you think you need to crank up the volume all the time. The sound quality degrades at very high volumes. But I use this in my kitchen/dining room area and as a connected wireless device it's performs quite well up to about 75% volume. The hidden dock is nice. Setup is pretty slick. I've had a few issues where it loses connection to my router and I've had to set it up again. It also looks really cool in person, premium build quality appearance.
customer_reviews.author: KurticusRex

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked the device, but it stopped working after a month: the AirPlay disappeared from iOS devices. The support was unable to help. I am trying to return it
customer_reviews.author: Marina T.

customer_reviews.title: Simpatico.
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound, easy to set up. Enough said, beautiful design, sleek look. Worth the purchase, came in 2 days, would consider buying a second.
customer_reviews.author: S. Selsavage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with Airport Express
customer_reviews.text: A dream after he nightmare of trying to set up the Sony airplay speaker. This is the kind of set up we Mac users are used to! I stuck my iPad on the speaker dock, it downloaded a free app. Then I click next, type in my wi-fi password, and press done! It works! ah! I think it has a really good sound, but I'm not a speaker snob.
customer_reviews.author: Arkay

customer_reviews.title: Reference
customer_reviews.text: For Abby’s reference. Please see the photos and advise. Thanks in advance
customer_reviews.author: Inquiry Purpose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Works great would buy another one if needed!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: So solid
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing and the AirPlay feature is great. I can play anything from my computer, IPad or phone. Can't best these speakers for the price. Only downside is the dock is 30 pin, but with the AirPlay feature there is no need for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Nadle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, don't know why airplay is not more popular and on more devices.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: This unit has excellent sound. Very convenient use. Charges my Ipad while in use. Easy set up. Fits anywhere in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: herbal girl

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was for a gift, and the user is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Sound is awesome! Setup is very easy
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the ease of setup - connecting to Wifi was a simple process done by docking my iPhone to the speaker to provide the password input and configuration. The sound is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Treleaven

customer_reviews.title: The speakers are what they said they would be.
customer_reviews.text: Had the product for a month. Good product no complaints. Sounds very strong for the money. Easy to hook up. I listen to mostly internet streaming music or talk, but iphone music perfect as well. Good sound and no skipping or problems with wifi connection. The base to hook up ipod device is flimsy, but why would you need to use it?
customer_reviews.author: Andrea and Ryan Sorg

customer_reviews.title: 20% Re-stocking fee?
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this purchase. I'll never buy from a third party seller again... 1. I couldn't get the speakers to work. Its very technical to get Airplay to work with these speakers and I'm a technical person. You need to attach your phone directly to the speaker first. The problem, is I have an iPhone 5S. The attachment is only for a 4S or below. 2. I returned to the seller and they charged me a 20% re-stocking fee! This for a product that didn't work! I returned the product within a week of my purchase. I ended up buying bluetooth Soundlink Mini by Bose and am Very happy. I wish I had done that to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Chris beckman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This air play speaker system is fantastic! Sleek looks great sound and room filling power...The Air Speaker is great if you're looking for cutting edge cool technology
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but networking sux
customer_reviews.text: This is 802.11G only. Unfortunately I had to downgrade my 802.11n 5Ghz network to be able to stream music to it...
customer_reviews.author: W. Knight

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After finally getting the speaker to find my network, connect to my computer, and play music, it crapped out after only 30 mins of play. The sound quality is good, but not worth the connection troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Magee

customer_reviews.title: The air speaker is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my iPod and blasts solid tones from the speaker with clarity at various volume levels. Nice job Logitech...this this is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Adams

customer_reviews.title: Box was banged up
customer_reviews.text: When my speaker arrived, it was in a box that was banged up and re-taped. It clearly had been returned by someone else. There was little packaging and no manual. I had to search online to find the manual. The quality of sound is excellent. I don't feel I should have to pay full price foe something that appeared to be used. I didn't send it back because I didn't want to pay the additional shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lilmac

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes has issues over wifi, not totally supported
customer_reviews.text: Best use case is with iTunes, but still there can be connection issues on the wifi network so that music will just stop abruptly. Also, it is still recognized as "streaming" by Spotify even when my iPad is directly connected to it, which limits it to radio play without a Premium Spotify account. Overall, the sound is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Riddle

customer_reviews.title: To Choppy
customer_reviews.text: Gave this product a fair shot, but after about a month of use it was just WAY to choppy when I attempted to stream over the WIFI. It couldn't even finish one song. I doubt it was my network because I stream video and download very easily. Either way, it didn't work as expected. Though, it does look great and sounded good when actually docked.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Zhe

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the Price...Lacking loudness and base
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically this product is very pleasing. The Airplay works great and easy to set-up. Soundwise I was a little disappointed. If you are a a base head like me, then this product isnt for you. It lacks the punch, and its missing the high end also. I gave it four stars because of the Airplay and price point.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Garbutt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sold on airplay but this works well for us on the job
customer_reviews.author: Blu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the speaker. It has great fidelity, is easy to program and works with my iPad, my iPhone, iTunes on my computer, and my 2 appleTVs. The low end is rich and the high end is crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed it. The sound is fantastic and it works smoothly with my iPhone and iPad. I had a bluetooth speaker before this and the airplay approach has been much, much smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis B Webb

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to Setup
customer_reviews.text: After 1.5 hours of trying to get this set up with an iphone and a laptop we never got it to work. We called amazon support, and spent another 30 minutes on the phone with them. We finally returned it because we were so fed up.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: The wireless works lousy. Difficult to dock an iPad. Sound is okay. Basically spent a lot of money for iPad dock that is hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth wasserman

customer_reviews.title: No Battery back up
customer_reviews.text: There is no Battery back up. We were hoping to take it with us (park, pool etc.) I wanted to exchange this item for another but received no response from the seller after filling out the Amazon form to exchange. PS The sound is wonderful so if you don't mind being plugged in all the time....
customer_reviews.author: B. Reisy

product_meta.title: Logitech UE Air Speaker for iPad, iPhone, iPod Touch and iTunes (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Logitech Air Speaker with Apple AirPlay technology lets you use your home Wi-Fi network to stream uncompressed audio from your iPad, iPhone, iPod touch or laptop.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


WE DONT JUST LOVE MUSIC. 
WE LIVE FOR IT.
 Everything we do is in the service of music. Our relentless commitment to honoring music drives us to push the boundaries of audio engineering, wireless connectivity and industrial design. All to create products that deliver music to your ears in its purest most undiluted form. Learn more about Logitech UE

POWER TO THE MUSIC
FEATURES
See FeaturesLOGITECH UE AIR SPEAKER
FOR IPAD, IPHONE, IPOD TOUCH AND ITUNES 
Stay close to the music. Even at a distance.
We created the Logitech UE Air Speaker for people who live for music and want to spend more time connecting with it, without messing with cables. That’s why our UE Sound Signature delivers pure, undiluted, uncompressed music wirelessly over AirPlay from all of your iOS devices. Connect effortlessly with the free setup app and stream custom-tuned, stereo sound from any room—all from a sleek and stylish speaker.

Images are for demonstration purposes only. Actual product may vary slightly. iPhone sold separately. enlargeMAXIMUM MUSIC FREEDOM
 * Built-in Apple AirPlay wireless technology streams high-quality uncompressed audio over your home Wi-Fi network from your iPad, iPhone, iPod touch or laptop with iTunes
 * Powerful 300 ft. long-range Wi-Fi connection vs. Bluetooth 30 ft range—enjoy a steady stream of music wherever you move around the house with your mobile device

UE SOUND SIGNATURE
Sound that’s distinctly and unmistakably UE—pure, undiluted, rich, clear and perfectly tuned * Custom-tuned drivers give you an impressively detailed and immersive listening experience:
 * Two woofers for warm mid range and deep bass
 * Two tweeters for crisp, soaring high notes
 * Two rear ports for effortless bass

enlargeSIMPLE SETUP
 * Quick-start app makes it easy to begin listening right away 
 * Just dock your device, follow the on-screen instructions to download the app, enter your network password and you're good to go 

enlargeEXCEPTIONAL STYLE
 * Subtle curves and handsome black-piano finish
 * Premium style that looks great in any room

enlargeTAKE TURNS PLAYING MUSIC
 * Once you're set up, any iOS device or computer on your home Wi-Fi network is instantly connected to the speaker 
 * Stream tunes from your iPad, your friends' iPhones or laptop—no pairing required 

enlargeHIDEAWAY DOCKING DRAWER
 Discreet Apple dock connector slides out for easy iPad or iPhone charging or playing music from your iPod classic.

COMPATIBILITY
WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * Speaker
 * AC adapter
 * User documentation

WORKS WITH
For AirPlay streaming: 
Wi-Fi network, plus at least one of the following: * iPad, iPhone or iPod touch with iOS 4.3 and later 
 * Mac or Windows computer with iTunes 10.2 and later 

For non-wireless playback using Apple 30-pin Connector Dock: * iPad: All models
 * iPhone: 3G and later
 * iPod touch: 2nd generation and later

For non-wireless playback using an Apple device with a Lightning Connector, an Apple Lightning to 30-pin Adapter is required.

Audio support for earlier iPod models and other portable music players, tablets and smartphones via 3.5 mm auxiliary input (requires a 3.5 mm audio cable, which is not included).

COMPARE
WHICH LOGITECH UE WIRELESS SPEAKER IS RIGHT FOR YOU?


Logitech UE Mobile Boombox 
blue / black / yellow / red / white


Logitech UE Boombox

Logitech UE Air SpeakerWhat do you get?Tiny ultra-portable speaker with big sound streamed from Bluetooth-enabled devicesElegant and portable design with seriously powerful sound streamed from Bluetooth devicesHome Wi-Fi speaker for effortless, high-quality audio streaming in any room from your Apple iOS devices or computers with iTunes Wireless Play Home Wi-Fi Speaker: With Apple Airplay Bluetooth Speaker: Up to 50 ft. wireless rangeMulti-Host Technology: Take turns playing music from compatible wireless devicesConnect 2 Bluetooth devices at the same timeConnect 3 Bluetooth devices at the same timeConnect any number of iOS devices at the same time Sound QualityPerfectly Tuned UE Sound SignatureUncompressed Audio Streaming: For highest quality wireless audioCustom-Tuned Speaker drivers2 full-range drivers, 1 passive radiator2 tweeters, 2 woofers, 4 passive radiators2 tweeters, 2 woofers, 2 portsDesign FeaturesApple Device DockMultiple Colors Built-In Microphone: Doubles as a speakerphonePowerRechargeable Battery10-hour battery life between charges6-hour battery life between chargesMicro USB Charging CableAC AdapterCompatibilityDevices SupportedAny Bluetooth-Enabled Smartphones, Tablets and Other Devices Any Bluetooth-Enabled Smartphones, Tablets and Other Devices For AirPlay streaming: Wi-Fi network, plus at least one of the following: iPad, iPhone or iPod touch with iOS 4.3 and later. Mac or Windows computer with iTunes 10.2 and later 

For non-wireless playback using Apple 30-pin Connector Dock:
iPad: All models
iPhone: 3G and later
iPod touch: 2nd generation and later

For non-wireless playback using an Apple device with a Lightning Connector, an Apple Lightning to 30-pin Adapter is required.

Aux Input (3.5 mm) for iPod and Most Other Portable Music Players
feature_bullets: Wi-Fi speaker with Apple AirPlay: Stream uncompressed audio over home Wi-Fi from your iPad, iPhone, iPod touch or laptop
Simple setup for multiple devices: Quick-start app connects the speaker to your Wi-Fi network and all your iOS devices-no individual pairing required
Easily expandable: Add AirPlay speakers to more rooms to sync your music as you move around the house
Premium sound and style: Beautiful modern design looks great in any room and delivers big, detailed stereo audio
Built-in Apple Dock Connector: Makes it easy to charge your iPad or iPhone or play music from your iPod classic or iPod Nano

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars98 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #9,389 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#68,124 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
